languages.text: Все решится в ближнем бою. Не теряя времени, мы с моей Жертвой сцепились в единый комок ярости и насилия. Каждый шаг, каждое решение, принятое в ходе этой скоротечной охоты, ложится грузом на одну или другую чашу весов, которые определят победителя.

The outcome will be decided in close combat. Wasting no time, my Prey and I seize one another in a violent, furious embrace. Every decision made over the course of this fleeting hunt is being weighed, tipping the scale that will ultimately determine the winner.
languages.original_text: Все решится в ближнем бою. Не теряя времени, мы с моей Жертвой сцепились в единый комок ярости и насилия. Каждый шаг, каждое решение, принятое в ходе этой скоротечной охоты, ложится грузом на одну или другую чашу весов, которые определят победителя.

traits.locale_text: The outcome will be decided in melee. Wasting no time, my Prey and I grasp one another in a violent, furious embrace. Every decision made over the course of this fleeting hunt is being weighed, tipping the scales that would ultimately choose the winner.
traits.speaker: Player

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 勝負は接近戦で決まる。時間を無駄にすることなく、私と獲物はお互いを掴み、激しくもみ合った。このつかの間の狩りの間に下された決断によって、最終的に勝者を決定する秤が傾くのである。
languages.original_text: The outcome will be decided in close combat. Wasting no time, my Prey and I seize one another in a violent, furious embrace. Every decision made over the course of this fleeting hunt is being weighed, tipping the scale that will ultimately determine the winner.

traits.locale_text: 勝負は接近戦で決まる。時間を無駄にすることなく、私と獲物はお互いを掴み、激しくもみ合った。このつかの間の狩りの間に下された決断によって、最終的に勝者を決定する秤が傾くのである。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 这场狩猎的胜负，全看接下来的肉搏了。我和猎物没有浪费任何时间，立刻扭打在了一起。这场狩猎很快就要结束了，每个动作都需要精心权衡，最终才能决定谁会获得胜利。
languages.original_text: The outcome will be decided in close combat. Wasting no time, my Prey and I seize one another in a violent, furious embrace. Every decision made over the course of this fleeting hunt is being weighed, tipping the scale that will ultimately determine the winner.

traits.locale_text: 这场狩猎的胜负，全看接下来的肉搏了。我和猎物没有浪费任何时间，立刻扭打在了一起。这场狩猎很快就要结束了，每个动作都需要精心权衡，最终才能决定谁会获得胜利。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: El resultado se decidirá en un combate cuerpo a cuerpo. Sin perder tiempo, mi presa y yo nos agarramos en un violento y furioso abrazo. Se está determinando el valor de cada decisión que hemos tomado en el transcurso de esta fugaz cacería, lo que decidirá quién se alza con la victoria.
languages.original_text: The outcome will be decided in close combat. Wasting no time, my Prey and I seize one another in a violent, furious embrace. Every decision made over the course of this fleeting hunt is being weighed, tipping the scale that will ultimately determine the winner.

traits.locale_text: El resultado se decidirá en un combate cuerpo a cuerpo. Sin perder tiempo, mi presa y yo nos estrechamos en un violento y furioso abrazo. Se está determinando el valor de cada decisión que hemos tomado en el transcurso de esta fugaz cacería, lo que decidirá quién se alza con la victoria.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Das Ergebnis wird im Nahkampf entschieden. Meine Beute und ich vergeuden keine Zeit, wir packen einander und vereinen uns zu einer gewalttätigen, wilden Umarmung. Jede Entscheidung, die im Laufe dieser kurzen Jagd getroffen wurde, wird abgewogen, die Waagschale senkt sich langsam in Richtung des Siegers.
languages.original_text: The outcome will be decided in close combat. Wasting no time, my Prey and I seize one another in a violent, furious embrace. Every decision made over the course of this fleeting hunt is being weighed, tipping the scale that will ultimately determine the winner.

traits.locale_text: Das Ergebnis wird im Nahkampf entschieden. Meine Beute und ich vergeuden keine Zeit, wir packen einander und vereinen uns zu einer gewalttätigen, wilden Umarmung. Jede Entscheidung, die im Laufe dieser kurzen Jagd getroffen wurde, wird abgewägt, die Waagschale senkt sich langsam in Richtung des Siegers.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: L'issue de ce combat sera décidée au corps à corps. Sans perdre plus de temps, ma proie et moi nous jetons violemment l'un sur l'autre, sentant que chacune des décisions prises au cours de ce combat sera mise dans la balance pour en déterminer le vainqueur.
languages.original_text: The outcome will be decided in close combat. Wasting no time, my Prey and I seize one another in a violent, furious embrace. Every decision made over the course of this fleeting hunt is being weighed, tipping the scale that will ultimately determine the winner.

traits.locale_text: L'issue de ce combat sera décidée au corps à corps. Sans perdre plus de temps, ma proie et moi nous jetons violemment l'un sur l'autre, sentant que chacune des décisions prises au cours de ce combat sera mise dans la balance pour en déterminer le vainqueur.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Sonucu yakın çatışma belirleyecek. Avım ve ben, zaman kaybetmeden vahşi, öfkeli bir mücadeleye girişiyoruz. Bu kısa süreli avda verilen her bir karar, burada etkisini gösteriyor ve nihayetinde kimin kazanacağı konusunda belirleyici olacak.
languages.original_text: The outcome will be decided in close combat. Wasting no time, my Prey and I seize one another in a violent, furious embrace. Every decision made over the course of this fleeting hunt is being weighed, tipping the scale that will ultimately determine the winner.

traits.locale_text: Sonuç, yakın dövüş ile belirlenecek. Av'ım ve ben hiç zaman kaybetmeden vahşi, öfkeli bir mücadeleye girişiyoruz. Bu geçici av sırasında yapılan her bir karar burada etkisini gösteriyor ve nihayetinde kimin kazanacağı konusunda belirleyici unsur olacak.
traits.speaker: Player
